mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RAA02B ( IB_DEAL_NO , RISK_INSPCT_CCD , LST_C_CASE_CCD , RA_DEAL_CCD , FST_RGST_P_DPRT_CD , RA_STD_YR_MM , RA_DEAL_SQ , RISK_RCG_NO , IB_DEAL_NM , OWN_P_ENO , FST_RGST_DT , UPT_P_ENO , UPT_RSN_CNTNT , RE_RGST_DT , HDQT_CD , DPRT_CD , CHRG_P_ENO , COPRTN_TYP_CD , PTCP_AMT , INVST_NTN_CD , INVST_CRNCY_CD , CRNCY_AMT , INVST_PRD_DY_C , WRT_EXPT_DT , MTRT_EXPT_DT , TL_ERN_AMT , WRT_ERN_AMT , RCVBL_ERN_AMT , INVST_GDS_LDVD_CD , INVST_GDS_MDVD_CD , INVST_GDS_SDVD_CD , INVST_GDS_DTLS_DVD_CD , MNG_DRCTG_APP_F , IND_TYP_DVD_CD , CHECK_ITEM_CD , MRTG_OFR_F , ENSR_F , RSPSB_CMPL_CCD , RISK_INSPCT_RSLTN_CCD , FST_CNFRNC_F , RPR_STRT_DT , OFCL_DOC_ACPT_DT , APLC_EXPT_DT , INSPCT_PRGRS_ST_CD , NHNDL_RSN_CNTNT , AGR_DT , AGR_AMT , RQS_DOC_NO , WRT_DT , MTRT_DT , CSH_NTR_ASTS_WRT_AMT , END_DT , OPTNL_END_CCD , END_BSS_CNTNT , INSPCT_CNCL_HNDL_CCD , IB_DEAL_SNM_NM , UPTA_INSPCT_PRGRS_ST_CD , FNC_GDS_DVD_CD , RA_BSNS_ZONE_CD , INVST_THING_CCD , INVST_THING_DTLS_CCD , UPT_DT , BSNS_DPRT_CMMT_RMRK1 , INSPCT_DPRT_CMMT_RMRK2 , RSLTN_CNFRNC_CCD , CFMT_DBT , WM_GDS_ETC , RA_RSLTN_CCD , MAIN_INVST_TRGT_NM , RA_FND_RSK_GRD_CD , MKTG_FEE_R , TL_RCPS_R , TRUST_RCPS_R , DL_DPRT_CD1 , DL_DPRT_CD2 , DL_DPRT_CD3 , ASTS_VAL_AMT , MIN_MRTG_RT , STD_DY_MRTG_RT , ETC_FNC_CNDT , APLC_EXCH_R , RA_ETC_FEE_R , RA_LSRT_FEE_R , RA_UDWRT_FEE_R , UDWRT_FNC_ISNG_DT , UDWRT_FNC_SBMS_DT , UDWRT_FNC_SBS_DT , TRSNS_INVST_F , BSNS_STTS_CCD , BSC_ASTS_INPT_EXPT_F , INS_GRD_INPT_EXPT_F , CFMT_ENTP_NM , ADVTCNQ_GDS_F , JN_QLFCT , MN_JN_AMT , WM_OTCM_RCPS_R , AC_MRTG_RT , INSPCT_DPRT_CCD , CNC_CMPNY_INPT_EXPT_F , HNDL_DY_TM , HNDL_DPRT_CD , HNDL_P_ENO ) VALUES ( #{ibDealNo} , #{riskInspctCcd} , #{lstCCaseCcd} , #{raDealCcd} , #{fstRgstPDprtCd} , #{raStdYrMm} , CAST(#{raDealSq} AS INT) , #{riskRcgNo} , TRIM(#{ibDealNm}) , '' , ( CASE WHEN #{raRsltnCcd} = '1' THEN '' ELSE DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m%d') END ) , '' , '' , DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m%d') , #{hdqtCd} , #{dprtCd} , #{chrgPEno} , #{coprtnTypCd} , NVL(#{ptcpAmt}, 0) , #{invstNtnCd} , #{invstCrncyCd} , NVL(#{crncyAmt}, 0) , NVL(#{invstPrdDyC}, 0) , '' , '' , NVL(NULLIF(#{tlErnAmt},'') IS NULL, 0) , NVL(NULLIF(#{wrtErnAmt},'') IS NULL, 0) , NVL(NULLIF(#{rcvblErnAmt},'') IS NULL, 0) , #{invstGdsLdvdCd} , #{invstGdsMdvdCd} , #{invstGdsSdvdCd} , #{invstGdsDtlsDvdCd} , '' , #{indTypDvdCd} , #{checkItemCd} , #{mrtgOfrF} , #{ensrF} , #{rspsbCmplCcd} , '' , '' , '' , '' , '' , ( CASE WHEN (#{raRsltnCcd} = '2' OR #{raRsltnCcd} = '3' OR #{raRsltnCcd} = '4' OR #{raRsltnCcd} = '5' OR #{raRsltnCcd} = '6') THEN '350' ELSE '100' END ) , '' , '' , 0 , '' , #{wrtDt} , #{mtrtDt} , 0 , '' , '' , '' , '' , #{ibDealSnmNm} , '' , #{fncGdsDvdCd} , #{raBsnsZoneCd} , #{invstThingCcd} , #{invstThingDtlsCcd} , '' , TRIM(#{bsnsDprtCmmtRmrk1}) , TRIM(#{inspctDprtCmmtRmrk2}) , '' , '' , '' , #{raRsltnCcd} , '' , '' , 0 , 0 , 0 , '' , '' , '' , 0 , 0 , 0 , '' , NVL(#{aplcExchR}, 0) , NVL(#{raEtcFeeR}, 0) , NVL(#{raLsrtFeeR}, 0) , NVL(#{raUdwrtFeeR}, 0) , #{udwrtFncIsngDt} , #{udwrtFncSbmsDt} , #{udwrtFncSbsDt} , '' , #{bsnsSttsCcd} , 'N' , 'N' , #{cfmtEntpNm} , '' , '' , 0 , 0 , 0 , #{inspctDprtCcd} , '' , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() , #{hndlDprtCd} , #{hndlPEno} )
mapper.select: SELECT IB_DEAL_NO , RISK_INSPCT_CCD , LST_C_CASE_CCD , RA_DEAL_CCD , FST_RGST_P_DPRT_CD , RA_STD_YR_MM , RA_DEAL_SQ , RISK_RCG_NO , IB_DEAL_NM , OWN_P_ENO , FST_RGST_DT , UPT_P_ENO , UPT_RSN_CNTNT , RE_RGST_DT , HDQT_CD , DPRT_CD , CHRG_P_ENO , COPRTN_TYP_CD , PTCP_AMT , INVST_NTN_CD , INVST_CRNCY_CD , CRNCY_AMT , INVST_PRD_DY_C , WRT_EXPT_DT , MTRT_EXPT_DT , TL_ERN_AMT , WRT_ERN_AMT , RCVBL_ERN_AMT , INVST_GDS_LDVD_CD , INVST_GDS_MDVD_CD , INVST_GDS_SDVD_CD , INVST_GDS_DTLS_DVD_CD , MNG_DRCTG_APP_F , IND_TYP_DVD_CD , CHECK_ITEM_CD , MRTG_OFR_F , ENSR_F , RSPSB_CMPL_CCD , RISK_INSPCT_RSLTN_CCD , FST_CNFRNC_F , RPR_STRT_DT , OFCL_DOC_ACPT_DT , APLC_EXPT_DT , INSPCT_PRGRS_ST_CD , NHNDL_RSN_CNTNT , AGR_DT , AGR_AMT , RQS_DOC_NO , WRT_DT , MTRT_DT , CSH_NTR_ASTS_WRT_AMT , END_DT , OPTNL_END_CCD , END_BSS_CNTNT , INSPCT_CNCL_HNDL_CCD , IB_DEAL_SNM_NM , UPTA_INSPCT_PRGRS_ST_CD , FNC_GDS_DVD_CD , RA_BSNS_ZONE_CD , INVST_THING_CCD , INVST_THING_DTLS_CCD , UPT_DT , BSNS_DPRT_CMMT_RMRK1 , INSPCT_DPRT_CMMT_RMRK2 , RSLTN_CNFRNC_CCD , CFMT_DBT , WM_GDS_ETC , RA_RSLTN_CCD , MAIN_INVST_TRGT_NM , RA_FND_RSK_GRD_CD , MKTG_FEE_R , TL_RCPS_R , TRUST_RCPS_R , DL_DPRT_CD1 , DL_DPRT_CD2 , DL_DPRT_CD3 , ASTS_VAL_AMT , MIN_MRTG_RT , STD_DY_MRTG_RT , ETC_FNC_CNDT , APLC_EXCH_R , RA_ETC_FEE_R , RA_LSRT_FEE_R , RA_UDWRT_FEE_R , UDWRT_FNC_ISNG_DT , UDWRT_FNC_SBMS_DT , UDWRT_FNC_SBS_DT , TRSNS_INVST_F , BSNS_STTS_CCD , BSC_ASTS_INPT_EXPT_F , INS_GRD_INPT_EXPT_F , CFMT_ENTP_NM , ADVTCNQ_GDS_F , JN_QLFCT , MN_JN_AMT , WM_OTCM_RCPS_R , AC_MRTG_RT , INSPCT_DPRT_CCD , CNC_CMPNY_INPT_EXPT_F , HNDL_DY_TM , HNDL_DPRT_CD , HNDL_P_ENO FROM RAA02B WHERE 1=1 AND IB_DEAL_NO = #{ibDealNo}
